What is (are) Skin Cancer ?,Melanoma is the fastest growing and most invasive type of skin cancer. This cancer arises from overgrowth of melanocytes. Melanocytes are specialized skin cells that produce a pigment called melanin.,NIHSeniorHealth,Skin Cancer
